newsSections.text: Great results from this past weekend at the GSSCC Ontario Regional Breed Show with SV Judge Rainer Mast. Hosted by Grand River Schutzhund club.  Both Ben and Brooke placed first in their class 18-24 months. Special thanks to Frank Anthony Plesa for your top handling.

Another significant milestone in our K9 training program. This month we've seen remarkable progress in our specialized detection training, with several dogs mastering complex scent discrimination tasks.
